0b62639d928ed0754614f0cc7cadd07a (19:00): -i have a question about the google maps api. i'd like to add things to the map later on in the page, while the map is created in the header. i put the "var map;" declaration outside the load-function of gmaps, but still something like "map.addOverlay(new GMarker(new GLatLng(52, 5)));" doesn't seem to work on another place than in the header. can anyone give me some hints about this?

0b62639d928ed0754614f0cc7cadd07a (19:02): -does it have something to do with the CDATA at the top?
